title: Substitute $$x^2-2x$$ Into the Integral
text: For this problem, we would want to use the expression $$u=x^2-2x$$ to find the antiderivative.
speech: For this problem, we would want to use the expression , u is equal to, x squared minus 2 x  to find the antiderivative.
